Title: Sudden Impact
Writer: Harry Julian Fink (characters), Rita M. Fink (characters), Joseph Stinson (screenplay), Earl E. Smith (story), Charles B. Pierce (story)
Actors: Clint Eastwood, Sondra Locke, Pat Hingle, Bradford Dillman
Plot: A rape victim is exacting revenge on her aggressors in a small town outside San Francisco. "Dirty" Harry Callahan, on suspension for angering his superiors (again), is assigned to the case.
